summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Even Better Clinical Brightening Moisturizer hydrates as it helps visibly improve multiple dimensions of discoloration.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesClinique's first-ever moisturizer with CL302 Brightening Complex helps visibly improve multiple dimensions of discoloration: dark spot contrast, dark spot intensity, dullness, and redness caused by irritation.Deeply hydrates, leaving skin feeling comfortable and soft.Refines skin's texture so it feels smoother.Calms and soothes skin to visibly reduce redness caused by irritation, which could trigger future dark spots.Formula facts: Oil-free. Non-acnegenic. Fragrance free. Allergy tested. Dermatologist testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Key IngredientsCL302 Brightening Complex: Helps treat the look of dark spots with:Salicylic acid: Gently sloughs off the uppermost layers of the skin to help reveal fresher, more even-looking skin.Glucosamine: Helps weaken the bonds that hold dead skin cells together to encourage the exfoliation of surface discoloration.Yeast extract: Clinique's "cluster buster" helps break up (exfoliate) large clusters of excess pigmentation.Vitamin C (ascorbyl glucoside): Potent brightening antioxidant helps visibly reduce dark spots.UP302 (dimethoxytolyl propylresorcinol): A targeted brightening molecule inspired by border silver, or dianella ensifolia, a botanical known in traditional Chinese medicine for its antioxidant properties.Plus, other powerful ingredients, which include:Gyokuro (camellia sinensis leaf) extract: A green tea harvested with a special method in Japan that helps quell the look of irritation, which can trigger future dark spots.Hyaluronic acid: This moisture-binding ingredient helps create a "moisture reservoir" for ideal hydration.Item 2604766How To UseUse AM and PM on clean skin. In the AM, follow with SPF.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Octyldodecyl Myristate, Dimethicone, Di-C12-15 Alkyl Fumarate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, PEG-100 Stearate, PEG-8, Glycerin, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tribehenin, Cetyl Alcohol, Acetyl Glucosamine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sucrose, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Algae Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Hordeum Vulgare Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Molasses Extract\Saccharum Officinarum\Extrait De MÃ©lasse, Salicylic Acid, Cholesterol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Citric Acid, Dimethoxytolyl Propylresorcinol, Sorbitan Oleate, Polysilicone-11, Di-C12-18 Alkyl Dimonium Chloride, Hexylene Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Isohexadecane, Disodium Edta, Bht, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM on clean skin. In the AM, follow with SPF.

reviews.headline: Great for rocacia!
reviews.comments: I love this cream, it's great for my dry skin and my Rocacia! Will continue to buy again!!

reviews.headline: Great moisture
reviews.comments: This is my favorite moisturizer! Soaks into skin and keeps me hydrated all day!

reviews.headline: So happy to have this back!
reviews.comments: I always liked this product, but then there was a disappointing substitute for it sold in a pump bottle that was   not nearly as productive on my skin.  The first night I used it, I woke up with a better result than I remembered!  I use it as a night cream and the best I've used after tries with other products even over $400.00.  At 76, this keeps my skin supple and helps fade any remaining dark spots of melasma (I'm not a sun person) from years of HRT more than a decade ago.  Love this and hope they keep it around forever!  The only bit of wrinkles I have are around the corners of my eyes when I smile and I do that often when using this outstanding cream.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this
reviews.comments: It has a lot of alcohol in it, it smells so much and it caused me to break out, had to return it. The lady prob told me to take it because its the less product that sells on here ðŸ¥²

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: This product was ok â€” just ok. I follow my regular routine and use this product only to find this is not what I would consider Clinique's best. I was looking for an overnight cream and the store help could not find anything but recommended this. I would not buy it again.

reviews.headline: Please bring back the regular Clinique Smart
reviews.comments: This doesn't work at all. The Clinique Smart (in the silver container) was amazing! I get that retinol is the popular thing, but not everyone needs it or can use it.

reviews.headline: Awful alone and under make-up
reviews.comments: I'm not generally a negative review writer but I had to on this one. Ir peels and flakes! And don't even bother wearing foundation over it. It's impossible and will ruin your day.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: So happy with this choice of face lotions

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This and cliniques acne clearing gel were the only products that clearee my acne. Ive tried almost everything but these two products were the only successful ones

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I got this on the recommendation from an associate, to help with my redness/roseaca. And wow was she spot on! She said it has the same ingredients as other redness reducing products and I have seen a drastic change in only under a week!

reviews.headline: Bright and hydrated !!
reviews.comments: Ive beem using this for a month now and I LOVE it! It makes my skin glow and hydrates all day. I have very sensitive skin and usually break out from every new product, but not with this. I dont even need a highlighter. I have really pale skin and and this gives me a nice rosy glow. I'm 56 and my skin looks amazing!!

reviews.headline: I would buy again helped my dark spots
reviews.comments: It works ...pleasant to use I like the gentle fragrance.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Recived as a sample. Was excited to try! Once applied face felt sticky and the product became flaky on face.

reviews.headline: Pleasant surprise
reviews.comments: I don't use a lot of Clinique products but I came across this and was intrigued by the ingredients. Upon my visit to ulta I couldn't find it and went with something else big mistake so after exchanging for this I can say so far so good. It's a true moisturizer doesn't leave a sticky or greasy look. The texture is nice light and fluffy so I can see myself using this in the warmer months. I like having one product packed with multifaceted ingredients so hopefully with continued use I'll see some lightening in dark spots and even out my complexion.

reviews.headline: Brightening moisture cream
reviews.comments: So far so good with the new brightening moisture cream from Clinique! I love the texture of this product. It feels like a nice balance between being a cream and a lotion. I love that it's oil free and has a whole complex of brightening ingredients to target dark spots and discoloration from multiple angles. Going to continue use for weeks to treat my stubborn acne scars.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my new favorite moisturizer!! Makes my skin so soft and hydrated. Doesn't feel heavy and makes my complexion brighter

reviews.headline: Unfortunately, not a great product
reviews.comments: I heard this was a brand new Clinique product. I put it on first thing in the morning as a moisturizer before my makeup, and a few minutes later it flaked all over my face. I had to brush off all of the flakes/residue to be able to put my foundation on.

faceoff_positive.comments: I always liked this product, but then there was a disappointing substitute for it sold in a pump bottle that was   not nearly as productive on my skin.  The first night I used it, I woke up with a better result than I remembered!  I use it as a night cream and the best I've used after tries with other products even over $400.00.  At 76, this keeps my skin supple and helps fade any remaining dark spots of melasma (I'm not a sun person) from years of HRT more than a decade ago.  Love this and hope they keep it around forever!  The only bit of wrinkles I have are around the corners of my eyes when I smile and I do that often when using this outstanding cream.
faceoff_positive.headline: So happy to have this back!

faceoff_negative.comments: Read the reviews.  Even though I did, I still wanted to give this a try but only purchased the 0.5 oz. Whew! I don't mind that this update doesn't have SPF. I prefer moisturizers without SPF since it's never high enough so I always layer SPF over it. Also I find that SPF in some moisturizers make it just sit on my face and never absorb. So I was looking forward to this. Not sure if this makes sense but it applied dry, with a thin chalky texture. Despite that, it never fully absorbed and rolled off no matter which foundation or tinted moisturizer I used. On days I didn't wear makeup, it looked nice and played well with my sunscreen, until I put on a mask. Then it would flake and pull all over my face and neck. And it's not the sunscreen.  This is not going to work for me. Another update that failed. After decades of using Clinique, I'm moving away from this brand with each update.  Aside from the moisture surge, there is no longer any moisturizer that I like from this brand.  I stopped buying serums from clinique when they discontinued the custom Smart serum.  I still love their toners and facial cleansers. For now.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ugh
